title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.17 - Notice to employees form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.17 - Notice to employees form

State Regulations

No insurance company or self-insurer may reduce the size
of notice to employees (form C-105) which is to be posted in all places of
employment covered by the Workers' Compensation Law, unless such permission is
granted on application to the chair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
